level.text: Each person eligible to vote in the general election for U.S. Representative may cast a ballot for no more than one (1) candidate in the contest.
At the time of certification of the general election results for the office of U.S. Representative, the Board shall certify the individual receiving the highest number of votes as the winner.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 D.C. Reg. 8364, 8371 (December 15, 1989).
